classic.name: Odeon of Herodes Atticus
classic.description: Concerts & other performances are held at this restored stone theater constructed in 161 CE.

classic.name: Acropolis of Athens
classic.description: Ruins of iconic 5th-century B.C. temple complex on Athens' rocky hilltop undergoing restoration.

classic.name: Stavros Niarchos Park
classic.description: Expansive green space next to a cultural center with landscaped walking paths & a playground.

classic.name: Stavros Niarchos Foundation Cultural Center (SNFCC)
classic.description: Modern cultural hub with a national library, opera house, theater & surrounding park.
classic.address: Leof. Andrea Siggrou, Paleo Faliro 176 74, Greece

classic.name: Parthenon
classic.description: Restored, landmark temple ruins on archaeological site with iconic Doric columns built from 447 BC.

classic.name: Areopagus Hill
classic.description: Historic site that once served as the high court of appeal for judicial cases in ancient Greece.

classic.name: Acropolis Museum
classic.description: Ultramodern glass & steel museum housing ancient artifacts from the Acropolis archaeological site.

classic.name: Panathenaic Stadium
classic.description: Site of the first modern Olympic games in 1896, now hosting ceremonial events & tours.

classic.name: Ancient Agora of Athens
classic.description: Famous landmark featuring the ruins of an ancient Greek gathering place & a museum with artifacts.

classic.name: Benaki Museum
classic.description: Former family mansion of an art collector, with displays on Greek culture from prehistory onwards.

foodie.name: Divani Caravel Hotel
foodie.description: Lavish property with high-end rooms & suites, plus multiple dining options, a spa & a rooftop pool.

foodie.name: Tavern Klimataria
foodie.description: Home-style cooking in an intimate old-school rustic restaurant with stone walls & live Greek music.

adventure.name: Stavros Niarchos Park
adventure.description: Expansive green space next to a cultural center with landscaped walking paths & a playground.

adventure.name: Philopappos Hill
adventure.description: Views of Athens & the Acropolis attract hikers to this small peak with an ancient monument.

adventure.name: Lycabettus Hill
adventure.description: Walkway through a wooded, steep-sloped park to a lookout near a chapel, popular for sunset views.

adventure.name: Athens National Garden
adventure.description: Big historic park with native & exotic plants, plus archeological remains & a children's library.

adventure.name: Monastiraki Square
adventure.description: Public plaza surrounded by restaurants & rooftop bars, home to a centuries-old Byzantine church.

adventure.name: Syntagma Square
adventure.description: The city's broad, tree-lined central square, with a fountain, cafes & park benches.

adventure.name: Water Square
adventure.description: Waterside venue for big-name concerts & music festivals, also popular for seaside walks & sunsets.

adventure.name: Antonis Tritsis Metropolitan Park
adventure.description: Urban park with olive groves & trails around a series of lakes, plus cafes & a small stone church.
